title: Ep. 673 - Everything Is Worse Than Watergate
description:
An old hack journalist calls Trump’s latest leaked phone call “worse than Watergate,” a Democrat congressman transgenders the word “amen,” and Kamala Harris steals a story from MLK.

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at: https://www.dailywire.com/knowles
